li yo-won, diyokman kumariya lesa, pasuwa sondok rajina wu [5][6] nam ji-hyun, diyokman kumariyage lamawiya lesa go hyun-jun, mishil bisawa lesa[7][8][9] ee, mishilge tharunawiya lesa um the wun, kim yushin lesa[10][11][12] li hyun-wu, kim yushinge lama wiya pak ye-jin, chunmiyun kumariya (diyokmange niwun soyuriya) lesa shin se-kyun, chunmiyunge lamawiya kim yu-jun, dasa wiyathi chunmiyun lesa kim nam-gil, bidam lesa [13][14][15] pak ji-bin, kuda bidam lesa yu siyun-ho, kim chunchu (chunmiyun kumariya saha kim yon-suge puthraya, 34wana kotasa) lesa sahaya ranganaya[sanskaranaya] li syun-hyo, kim alchon lesa (hwaranwarunge anadena niladhariyeki, pasuwa diyokman kumariyage sahayakaya saha paudgalik aarakshakaya bawata path we.)
